DRMPlugin::AES128CBCEncryptor

DRMPlugin::AES128CBCEncryptor Class Reference

Encrypts data according to AES algorithm (with 128-bit key) in CBC mode. More...

#include <ICipher.h>

Public Member Functions

virtual bool NextIV (ByteT **par, UInt32T *parLen)=0
 Get initialization vector that is to be used for next packet encryption.

Detailed Description

Encrypts data according to AES algorithm (with 128-bit key) in CBC mode.

Encrypts data and gets initialization vector that is to be used for encrypting next packet.

Definition at line 81 of file ICipher.h.

UInt32T *  parLen
)  [pure virtual]
 

Get initialization vector that is to be used for next packet encryption.

Parameters:
par output, initialization vector.
parLen output, size of the initialization vector.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure. In case of failure, logger's log will contain error message.
